news.title: Brian Eno Criticizes Microsoft for Support of Israeli Military
news.summary: In an open letter lamenting the company’s provision of tech services to Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu’s government, Eno says he will donate his fee for the Windows 95 startup sound to victims in Gaza

news.title: Rod Wave’s Attorneys Say Rapper Is Victim of a Burglary After Arrest on Assault Charges
news.summary: The musician was booked in Georgia for aggravated assault, possession of a firearm, and more. His attorneys say it’s “incomprehensible” that he was charged.

news.title: Grinderman to Reissue Albums on Vinyl and CD
news.summary: New editions of Nick Cave’s Grinderman, Grinderman 2, and Grinderman 2 RMX arrive in July

news.title: Girlpool’s Avery Tucker Shares Video for Debut Solo Single: Watch
news.summary: Tucker co-wrote and co-produced “Big Drops” with Alaska Reid

news.title: Kieran Hebden and William Tyler Announce New Album, Share Song: Listen
news.summary: An 11-minute cover of Lyle Lovett’s “If I Had a Boat” leads new album 41 Longfield Street Late ‘80s

news.title: Wednesday Share Video for New Song “Elderberry Wine”: Watch
news.summary: The Asheville, North Carolina, indie-rock band’s first new music since Rat Saw God

news.title: Gorillaz Celebrate 25th Anniversary With London Concerts and House of Kong Exhibition
news.summary: The summer residency at Copper Box ties in with a mysterious on-site “journey” through the band’s history

news.title: Vybz Kartel Announces 2025 Tour, Shares Video for New Song: Watch
news.summary: The newly freed Jamaican dancehall singer returns with “Pretty Girl” ahead of his Worl’ Boss Tour

news.title: The Armed Announce New Album and Tour, Share Video for New Song “Well Made Play”
news.summary: The Future Is Here and Everything Needs to Be Destroyed is out August 1 via Sargent House
